name: Trevor Brooking's World Cup Glory
description: Trevor Brooking's World Cup Glory is a football managerial game that allows you to take charge of England to win the FIFA World Cup. You can select your squad and train them before moving onto the match. This is shown as lines of commentary with a clock ticking away. The game is text only with no graphics and the keyboard is used to enter your decisions.

shot.caption: The game's loading screen which goes into great detail in explaining just who Trevor Brooking actually is...oh sorry that should be Sir Trevor Brooking, since he is now knighted
The title screen
Enter skill level...what's the point we're going to be rubbish anyway!
Enter manager's name, hello Moby! Nice to see you again!
The main menu
Here's where you select your squad
Here is your group, and England (that'll be us) are drawn with Scotland, Norway and West Germany...now that's unfair!
The info screen, it is here where you may save your game into a blank cassette
Goodbye month 1, hello month 2!
Training...good to see some improvement within the squad at least
Teamwork training in progress....
Oh dear, well that went well didn't it?
So here it is then, our first World Cup qualifier against Scotland
Selecting my team
ENGERLAND ENGERLAND ENGERLAAAAAND!
Oh brilliant! 24 minutes in and the goalie's been booked for time-wasting already!
It's Half Time and Trevor, sorry SIR Trevor, gives us his analysis of the game thus far...it is safe to assume he is not amused
Substitution by Scotland....will this change the game I wonder?
Oh I don't believe it! Scotland have scored!
Full Time....we lost...and Trevor is not pleased...and nor is Moby for that matter....sorry Moby
